rooms.description: Welcome space with a small sitting area, adhering to Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Open living-dining and kitchen layout designed in Bohemian style with vibrant colors and eclectic decor. The kitchen is integrated, ensuring a seamless flow between cooking and social spaces.
Bohemian-styled bedroom incorporating soft textures and artistic touches for one family member; includes a small wardrobe area.

Dedicated home office space with ergonomic design, ample natural light from the east or north window placements to enhance productivity. Incorporates minimalistic decor while respecting Vastu guidelines for career spaces.
Additional bohemian-themed bedroom for another family member, with unique wall art and personal space.

openings.description: Balcony providing natural light and ventilation, beneficial per Vastu.
